title: New: Apache Jackson – BORED COPS
content:
Dark, broken and brooding RnB act Apache Jackson is back with his first piece of material in over 2 years.

The Portland native was one of our ‘sounds of 2012’, perhaps back then we had jumped the gun a bit, with only 2 EPs under his belt he still had a significant amount to prove. BORED COPS, see’s him take a refreshing new direction. The synths and bass are thicker; the vocals powerful, taking reference from Gabriel Bruce, and the overall pop aesthetic takes centre stage. Interested to see where this project goes again.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
